meanings: paying each for his own account

vlive.korean: 각자... Oh, each member ... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [LOVELYZ] 지구로 내려온 8명의 여신들😇(올림푸스” 뭐야 돌려줘요”) (LOVELYZ talking about their teaser images)

vlive.korean: 혹시 또 하반기에 각자 하고 싶었던 일 같은 거 있나요? Do you each have something you wanted to do perhaps in the second half of the year? 듣기 View video BTS : 꿀FM <지진정의 R.A.D.I.O 라디오> #중대발표

examples.korean: We all have our fears and insecurities. 발음듣기 우리는 모두 각자 두려워하고 불안해하는 것들이 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We all have our fears and insecurities. 발음

examples.korean: We each chipped in (with) £5. 발음듣기 우리는 각자 5파운드씩 돈을 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
We each have our own car. 발음듣기 우리는 각자 자기 차를 갖고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We each have our own car. 발음

examples.korean: the respective roles of men and women in society 발음듣기 사회 속에서 남녀 각자의 역할 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the respective roles of men and women in society 발음

examples.korean: We all have our crosses to bear. 발음듣기 우리 모두 각자가 져야 할 십자가가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We all have our crosses to bear. 발음
